title: CalmPace – Guided Breathing Coach
goal: Deliver 3-minute adaptive breathing sessions with instant feedback.
why_it_matters: Even short, paced-breathing sessions lower anxiety and restore focus before exams.
data: Session duration, breaths per minute, self-rated calmness pre/post.
ai: Heuristic adherence model adjusting pace next time (e.g., slower if early termination).
workflow: Generates next session recommendation and tracks streak.
outcome: Great mini-project for behavioral feedback design and user retention metrics.
